mapper.select: select p.field_trip_id from tbl_payment p inner join view_field_trip f on p.field_trip_id = f.field_trip_id and p.user_id = f.user_id;
SELECT user_id, member_name, member_nickname, member_gender, user_identification, user_password, user_email, user_phoneNumber, user_address, user_register_date FROM kids.view_member_info;
